ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I am comfortable about people finding out that I am LGBTQ+
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is important to me to control who knows about my LGBTQ+ identity
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel comfortable discussing my LGBTQ+ identity in a public situation
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Even if I could change my LGBTQ+ identity I wouldn't
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Most LGBTQ+ people cannot sustain a long-term committed relationship
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Most LGBTQ+ people prefer anonymous sexual encounters
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: LGBTQ+ people tend to flaunt their sexuality inappropriately
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: People with LGBTQ+ identities are generally more promiscuous than heterosexual, cisgender people
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I often feel intimidated while at LGBTQ+ venues
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Social situations with LGBTQ+ individuals make me feel uncomfortable
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Making an advance to another LGBTQ+ person is difficult for me
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree
